scenario.title: check market.yande.ru TV section
scenario.step: Given browser open the page on yandex.ru
When the transition to the section market
And sets the specified search criteria
And to keep the name of the first element in the list

When copy a saved name in the search boxorg.openqa.selenium.remote.UnreachableBrowserException: Error communicating with the remote browser. It may have died.
